case.title: Any August plans? - 24
case.text:
So I've got some big deadlines mid August and will be very busy until then but want to start planning some fun times to celebrate for afterwards.
Thinking I might be up for meeting someone new then also, if we're on a level and you can suggest something tempting enough. So let me know your ideas if you fancy taking a young, tall and slim Russian brunette out somewhere.
Preference for smart, tall and cultural gentlemen.
PLEASE NOTE: this is not a dating call and does not entail any intimate offers- those will go straight to junk.
